verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are [the records of] the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> (that is, Edom <WH9000>).

Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives <WH802> from the daughters <WH1323> of Canaan: <WH3667> Adah <WH5711> the daughter <WH1323> of Elon <WH356> the Hittite, <WH2850> and Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034> and the granddaughter <WH1323> of Zibeon <WH6649> the Hivite; <WH2340>
also Basemath, <WH1315> Ishmael's daughter, <WH1323> the sister <WH269> of Nebaioth. <WH5032>
And Adah <WH5711> bore <WH3205> Eliphaz <WH464> to Esau, <WH6215> and Basemath <WH1315> bore <WH3205> Reuel, <WH7467>

and Oholibamah <WH173> bore <WH3205> Jeush <WH3266> and Jalam <WH3281> and Korah. <WH7141> These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215> who <WH834> were born <WH3205> to him in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

Then Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives <WH802> and his sons <WH1121> and his daughters <WH1323> and all <WH3605> his household, <WH1004> and his livestock <WH4735> and all <WH3605> his cattle <WH929> and all <WH3605> his goods <WH7075> which <WH834> he had acquired <WH7408> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and went <WH1980> to [another] land <WH776> away from his brother <WH251> Jacob. <WH3290>

For their property <WH7399> had become <WH1961> too <WH4480> great <WH7227> for them to live <WH3427> together, <WH9191> and the land <WH776> where <WH4033> they sojourned <WH4033> could <WH3201> not sustain <WH5375> them because <WH4480> <WH6440> of their livestock. <WH4735>
So Esau <WH6215> lived <WH3427> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Seir; <WH8165> Esau <WH6215> is Edom. <WH9000>
These <WH428> then are [the records of] the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> the father of the Edomites <WH1> in the hill <WH9000> country <WH2022> of Seir. <WH2022>

These <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of Esau's sons: <WH1121> Eliphaz <WH464> the son <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Adah, <WH5711> Reuel <WH7467> the son <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Basemath. <WH1315>
And the sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz <WH464> were Teman, <WH8487> Omar, <WH201> Zepho <WH6825> and Gatam <WH1609> and Kenaz. <WH7073>

And Timna <WH8555> was a concubine <WH6370> of Esau's son <WH1121> Eliphaz <WH464> and she bore <WH3205> Amalek <WH6002> to Eliphaz. <WH464> These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Adah. <WH5711>

And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel: <WH7467> Nahath <WH5184> and Zerah, <WH2226> Shammah <WH8048> and Mizzah. <WH4199> These <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Basemath. <WH1315>

And these <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802> Oholibamah, <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034> and the granddaughter <WH1323> of Zibeon: <WH6649> she bore <WH3205> to Esau, Jeush <WH3266> and Jalam <WH3281> and Korah. <WH7141>

These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> of the sons <WH1121> of Esau. <WH6215> The sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz, <WH464> the first-born of Esau, <WH6215> are chief <WH441> Teman, <WH8487> chief <WH441> Omar, <WH201> chief <WH441> Zepho, <WH6825> chief <WH441> Kenaz, <WH7073>

chief <WH441> Korah, <WH7141> chief <WH441> Gatam, <WH1609> chief <WH441> Amalek. <WH6002> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from Eliphaz <WH464> in the land <WH776> of Edom; <WH9000> these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Adah. <WH5711>

And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel, <WH7467> Esau's son: <WH1121> chief <WH441> Nahath, <WH5184> chief <WH441> Zerah, <WH2226> chief <WH441> Shammah, <WH8048> chief <WH441> Mizzah. <WH4199> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from Reuel <WH7467> in the land <WH776> of Edom; <WH9000> these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Basemath. <WH1315>

And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Esau's wife <WH802> Oholibamah: <WH173> chief <WH441> Jeush, <WH3266> chief <WH441> Jalam, <WH3281> chief <WH441> Korah. <WH7141> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from Esau's wife <WH802> Oholibamah, <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah. <WH6034>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215> (that is, Edom <WH9000>), and these <WH428> are their chiefs. <WH441>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> the Horite, <WH2752> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land: <WH776> Lotan <WH3877> and Shobal <WH7732> and Zibeon <WH6649> and Anah, <WH6034>

and Dishon <WH1787> and Ezer <WH687> and Dishan. <WH1789> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from the Horites, <WH2752> the sons <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> in the land <WH776> of Edom. <WH9000>
And the sons <WH1121> of Lotan <WH3877> were Hori <WH2752> and Hemam; <WH1950> and Lotan's sister <WH269> was Timna. <WH8555>
And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Shobal: <WH7732> Alvan <WH5935> and Manahath <WH4506> and Ebal, <WH5858> Shepho <WH8195> and Onam. <WH208>

And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Zibeon: <WH6649> Aiah <WH345> and Anah <WH6034> â€“ he is the Anah <WH6034> who <WH834> found <WH4672> the hot <WH3222> springs <WH3222> in the wilderness <WH4057> when he was pasturing <WH7462> the donkeys <WH2543> of his father Zibeon. <WH1>
And these <WH428> are the children <WH1121> of Anah: <WH6034> Dishon, <WH1787> and Oholibamah, <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah. <WH6034>
And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Dishon: <WH1787> Hemdan <WH2533> and Eshban <WH790> and Ithran <WH3506> and Cheran. <WH3763>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Ezer: <WH687> Bilhan <WH1092> and Zaavan <WH2190> and Akan. <WH6130>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Dishan: <WH1789> Uz <WH5780> and Aran. <WH765>
These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from the Horites: <WH2752> chief <WH441> Lotan, <WH3877> chief <WH441> Shobal, <WH7732> chief <WH441> Zibeon, <WH6649> chief <WH441> Anah, <WH6034>

chief <WH441> Dishon, <WH1787> chief <WH441> Ezer, <WH687> chief <WH441> Dishan. <WH1789> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> descended from the Horites, <WH2752> according to their [various] chiefs <WH441> in the land <WH776> of Seir. <WH8165>

Now these <WH428> are the kings <WH4428> who <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH9000> before <WH6440> any king <WH4428> reigned <WH4427> over the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
Bela <WH1106> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> reigned <WH4427> in Edom, <WH9000> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Dinhabah. <WH1838>
Then Bela <WH1106> died, <WH4191> and Jobab <WH3103> the son <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> of Bozrah <WH1224> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place. <WH8478>
Then Jobab <WH3103> died, <WH4191> and Husham <WH2367> of the land <WH776> of the Temanites <WH8489> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place. <WH8478>

Then Husham <WH2367> died, <WH4191> and Hadad <WH1908> the son <WH1121> of Bedad, <WH911> who defeated <WH5221> Midian <WH4080> in the field <WH7704> of Moab, <WH4124> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place; <WH8478> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Avith. <WH5762>
Then Hadad <WH1908> died, <WH4191> and Samlah <WH8072> of Masrekah <WH4957> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place. <WH8478>
Then Samlah <WH8072> died, <WH4191> and Shaul <WH7586> of Rehoboth <WH7344> on the [Euphrates] River <WH5104> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place. <WH8478>
Then Shaul <WH7586> died, <WH4191> and Baal-hanan the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place. <WH8478>

Then Baal-hanan the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> died, <WH4191> and Hadar <WH1924> became <WH4427> king <WH4427> in his place; <WH8478> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Pau; <WH6464> and his wife's name <WH8034> was Mehetabel, <WH4105> the daughter <WH1323> of Matred, <WH4308> daughter <WH1323> of Mezahab. <WH4314>

Now these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the chiefs <WH441> descended from Esau, <WH6215> according to their families <WH4940> [and] their localities, <WH4725> by their names: <WH8034> chief <WH441> Timna, <WH8555> chief <WH441> Alvah, <WH5933> chief <WH441> Jetheth, <WH3509>
chief <WH441> Oholibamah, <WH173> chief <WH441> Elah, <WH425> chief <WH441> Pinon, <WH6373>
chief <WH441> Kenaz, <WH7073> chief <WH441> Teman, <WH8487> chief <WH441> Mibzar, <WH4014>

chief <WH441> Magdiel, <WH4025> chief <WH441> Iram. <WH5902> These <WH428> are the chiefs <WH441> of Edom <WH9000> (that is, Esau, <WH6215> the father of the Edomites <WH1>), according to their habitations <WH9000> in the land <WH4186> of their possession. <WH776>
